TestCase.name: testCannotPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE price > 10

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($3, 10)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($3, 10)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[]]]])

TestCase.name: testCannotPushDownWithVirtualColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM VirtualTable WHERE price > 10

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[$3], price=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($4, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[+($2, 1)], price=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[$3], price=[$4]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[+($2, 1)], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($3, 10)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[]]]])

TestCase.name: testCannotPushDown3
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE amount > 2 OR amount < 10

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(>($2, 2), <($2, 10))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(>($2, 2), <($2, 10))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[]]]])

TestCase.name: testCannotPushDown3WithVirtualColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM VirtualTable WHERE amount > 2 OR amount < 10

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[$3], price=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(>($2, 2), <($2, 10))]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[+($2, 1)], price=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[$3], price=[$4]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[+($2, 1)], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(>($2, 2), <($2, 10))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[]]]])

TestCase.name: testCanPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE amount > 2

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[greaterThan(amount, 2)]]]])

TestCase.name: testCanPushDownWithVirtualColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM VirtualTable WHERE amount > 2

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[$3], price=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 2)]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[+($2, 1)], price=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[$3], price=[$4]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[+($2, 1)], price=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[greaterThan(amount, 2)]]]])

TestCase.name: testFullyPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE amount > 2 AND amount < 10

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>($2, 2), <($2, 10))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[and(greaterThan(amount, 2), lessThan(amount, 10))]]]])

TestCase.name: testFullyPushDownWithVirtualColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM VirtualTable WHERE amount > 2 AND amount < 10

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[$3], price=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>($2, 2), <($2, 10))]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[+($2, 1)], price=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[$3], price=[$4]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[+($2, 1)], price=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[and(greaterThan(amount, 2), lessThan(amount, 10))]]]])

TestCase.name: testLowerUpperPushdown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MTable WHERE LOWER(a) = 'foo' AND UPPER(b) = 'bar'

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=(LOWER($0), _UTF-16LE'foo'), =(UPPER($1), _UTF-16LE'bar'))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[and(equals(lower(a), 'foo'), equals(upper(b), 'bar'))]]]])

TestCase.name: testPartialPushDown
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE amount > 2 AND price > 10

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>($2, 2), >($3, 10))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($3, 10)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[greaterThan(amount, 2)]]]])

TestCase.name: testPartialPushDown2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE amount > 2 OR price > 10

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(>($2, 2), >($3, 10))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(>($2, 2), >($3, 10))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[]]]])

TestCase.name: testUnconvertedExpression
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE amount > 2 AND id < 100 AND CAST(amount AS BIGINT) > 10

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>($2, 2), <($1, 100), >(CAST($2):BIGINT, 10))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(<($1, 100), >(CAST($2):BIGINT, 10))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[greaterThan(amount, 2)]]]])

TestCase.name: testPartialPushDown2WithVirtualColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM VirtualTable WHERE amount > 2 OR price > 10

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[$3], price=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(>($2, 2), >($4, 10))]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[+($2, 1)], price=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[$3], price=[$4]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[+($2, 1)], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(>($2, 2), >($3, 10))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[]]]])

TestCase.name: testWithUdf
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable WHERE amount > 2 AND myUdf(amount) < 32

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>($2, 2), <(myUdf($2), 32))]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<(org$apache$flink$table$planner$expressions$utils$Func1$$879c8537562dbe74f3349fa0e6502755($2), 32)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[greaterThan(amount, 2)]]]])

TestCase.name: testPartialPushDownWithVirtualColumn
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM VirtualTable WHERE amount > 2 AND price > 10

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[$3], price=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(>($2, 2), >($4, 10))]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[+($2, 1)], price=[$3]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[false], filter=[]]]])

LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[$3], price=[$4]) +- LogicalProject(name=[$0], id=[$1], amount=[$2], virtualField=[+($2, 1)], price=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($3, 10)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, VirtualTable, source: [filterPushedDown=[true], filter=[greaterThan(amount, 2)]]]])
